original_text:
“In that day the mountains will drip new wine,
    and the hills will flow with milk;
    all the ravines of Judah will run with water.
A fountain will flow out of the Lord’s house
    and will water the valley of acacias.
korean_text: 그 날에 산들이 단 포도주를 떨어뜨릴 것이며 작은 산들이 젖을 흘릴 것이며 유다 모든 시내가 물을 흘릴 것이며 여호와의 성전에서 샘이 흘러 나와서 싯딤 골짜기에 대리라

sentences.original_text: In that day the mountains will drip new wine
sentences.korean_translation: 그 날에는 산들이 새 포도주를 떨어뜨릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the hills will flow with milk
all the ravines of Judah will run with water
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 모든 골짜기들은 물로 흐를 것이라

sentences.original_text: A fountain will flow out of the Lord's house
and will water the valley of acacias
